name: SpringHill Suites Atlanta Alpharetta

reviews.title: great place to stay
reviews.text: Stayed in the Springhill Suites in Alpharetta, GA over the Thanksgiving holiday. It was just great and exceeded our expectations. A good, solid accommodation for visiting family in the area. I would certainly stay there again.

reviews.title: Best hotel ever!
reviews.text: I stayed at this hotel in September, 2000 when it was brand new. I couldn't get over the size of our room. It was bigger than my apartment!

aka: Springhill Suites Atlanta Alpharetta Hotel Alpharetta
